title: Vaishnavi Diamond Grand Necklace - A Dazzling Statement
materials: Certified Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
Pear Cut Emeralds. Featuring Hyderabadi Zirconia polish for long-lasting shine.
features: This meticulously crafted necklace showcases a harmonious blend of traditional and modern design. The centerpiece features a striking cushion-cut Ruby surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds, leading to beautifully intricate diamond-studded patterns. The necklace features pear-shaped emerald accents to add a touch of color and elegance. The base of the necklace features the same design studded with tiny diamonds.
occasions: and high-profile social events. A stunning choice for the bride's Muhurtham or Sangeet ceremony.
description: This necklace is a true masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship. The use of high-quality diamonds and gemstones, combined with the intricate design, makes it a timeless investment. The Hyderabadi Zirconia polish ensures lasting brilliance. It embodies both traditional values and contemporary aesthetics, making it a versatile piece for any modern woman.
